testcase.name: Verification of Login button on home Page
Redirection to Home Page on Clicking on the Header or Title on the Page
testcase.system-out: Given website is opened.....................................................passed When click on the logo on the Home Page.....................................passed Then Redirect to the Home Page..............................................passed

testcase.name: Redirection to Respective Section on Clicking on the Menu Option.
testcase.system-out: Given HomePage is opened....................................................passed When click on the menu options on Home Page.................................passed Then Redirect to the Respective Page........................................passed

testcase.name: Search Medicine
testcase.system-out: Given website is upon running...............................................passed And navigate to medicines page..............................................passed When user type on Search box................................................passed And user click on Search button.............................................passed Then list of Searched Products should display...............................passed

testcase.name: Adding Medicine to the Cart
testcase.system-out: Given search Medicine is done...............................................passed When User click on add to cart button.......................................passed Then Medicine Successfully add to cart......................................passed

testcase.name: Updating the Cart
testcase.system-out: Given Medicine is added to the Cart.........................................passed When user click on adding or deleting.......................................passed Then quantity of products need to be updated in the cart....................passed

testcase.name: Place order for Medicine
testcase.system-out: Given add the medicines to the cart.........................................passed When User click on the Proceed button.......................................passed And User Select the Prescription type.......................................passed And User click on proceed button............................................passed Then Payment options Page should come.......................................passed

testcase.name: Check login is successful with valid credentials�
Check login with invalid phone number�
testcase.system-out: Given user is in website....................................................passed And User is on login page invalid...........................................passed When user enters invalid phone number.......................................passed Then user is not able click on get OTP button...............................passed

testcase.name: Check login with invalid otp
testcase.system-out: Given browser is ready......................................................passed And User is on login........................................................passed When user enters phone number invalid.......................................passed And user press on login button..............................................passed And user enters wrong otp...................................................passed Then user is not able to click on login button..............................passed
